entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Slow Collectionview Rendering performance in Maui compared to Xamarin #24224
  • [Android] Dynamically loading an assembly results in BadImageFormatException #24221
  • Hot Reload setting a Dynamic Resource does not make it Dynamic #24218
  • SystemResources depends on DependencyService #24216
  • [Windows] IconImageSource as StreamImageSource of ContentPage in TabbedPage doesn't display #24214
  • "No C# compiler has been specified" trying to compile iOS Bindings library #24210
  • NavigationPage does not close reliably #24204
  • FlyoutItemIsVisible is not working with bindings #24203
    9.0-rc1
  • Adding many styles causes a MAUI app to crash on launch #24193

Closed

  • The ScrollTo method does not carry the element in a grouping #8718
    .NET 8 SR9
  • About MAUI appicon and splash not updating on iOS device #24159
  • Theming android native timepicker popup #24092
    Backlog
  • [WinUI] CollectionView GridItemsLayout Shows 6 Columns Even When Span is Set to 7, When Display Scale is Set to 125% or 150% #23684
  • [regression/8.0.3] Shell.NavBarIsVisible is not working on iOS #18948
    Backlog
  • [Windows] MauiWinUIWindow leak #24102
    .NET 8 SR9
  • [Testing] Fix EnsureSupportForCustomWebViewClients #24146
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Maui Frame - Shadow on Frame not working on Maui #24168
  • MAUI create a pdf same as content page #24174
  • Windows does not raise Tapped event while Android does. #24175
  • .Net Maui c# Android MainPage.xaml.cs Can't access Methods from Button call #24180
  • .net MAUI Blazor App Lambda expressions in @for loop capturing incorrect index value #24181
  • Severity Code Description Project File Line Suppression State Error (active) CS0104 'Permissions' is an ambiguous reference between 'Microsoft.Maui.Ap #24183
  • MAUI Permission for Write Storage is always Denied in Android #24173
  • How to enable auto-update for Microsoft, Apple and Android Store published .MAUI Blazor App? #24172
  • IOS and ANDROID status bar cannot change color #24177
  • DependencyInjetion fires together with maui Exceptions #24184
  • MAUI XAML errors about ContentPage (and others) not found #24188
  • Issue with updating to Microsoft.Identity.Client v4.61.0 #24189
  • Unable to upgrade nuget package Microsoft.Maui.Controls and Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility 8.0.14 to 8.0.7 #24190
  • App crashes when returning to app from background [main/xamarin_main/monotouch-main/etc.) #23682
  • Button VerticalOptions behaviour different between Android and iOS when in a Grid #24192

PullRequests

Created

  • [android] call `PlatformContentViewGroup.postInvalidate()` less #24222
    platform/android 🤖, t/perf
  • [ci] Use passwordless auth for darc/maestro #24220
    area-infrastructure
  • Add some defensive code around layout propagation #24217
  • Fixed FlyoutItemIsVisible is not working with bindings #24212
    community ✨
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24209
    community ✨
  • Fix 899474 #24207
    community ✨
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8 #24206
  • Defining CollectionView GroupFooterTemplate crashes the app #24205
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix for CornerRadius of GradientDrawable for ImageButton #24200
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix SearchBar presentation taken whole screen size in horizontal screen orientation #24198
    community ✨
  • Fix "Grey" cannot be used to set Background property #24197
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix Entry clear button is not taking the color of the text. #24196
    community ✨
  • Fix for FlexLayout padding issue #24195
    community ✨

Merged

  • Blazor Hybrid Template Remove reference to removed styling #24199
    area-templates
  • Fixed scroll to group item on Android + Windows #16704
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, stale
  • Add xUnit types to avoid first-chance exceptions in tests #24130
    area-testing
  • [Accessibility] Make flyout titles on iOS read as buttons #24018
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/a11y
  • [Binding SG] Use Binding.Create internally in MAUI #23722
  • Fix Shell.NavBarIsVisible property #20173
    area-xaml, area-controls-shell
  • [net8.0] Update macios to latest stable release #24155
  • [Windows] Fix memory leak w/ main window #24176
    platform/windows 🪟, memory-leak 💦
  • Move EnsureSupportForCustomWebViewClients to Appium #24167
    area-testing

Updated

  • Fix cake scripts to work locally #24111
  • [Windows] Fix crash using ScrollTo on CollectionView #19921
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • Fixed low quality images in Resizetizer #23924
    area-single-project, community ✨
  • [iOS] Bugfix/22469 ios label crash #22487
    community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [X] allow namescope resolution before parenting #22854
    area-xaml
  • [X] Dont SetBinding for values returned by OnIdiom #23272
    area-xaml
  • [Binding SG] Enable usage of private fields and properties in SetBinding path #23810
    area-xaml
  • [Testing] Added specific actions by platform #21330
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Add Android LoadImageFromFont benchmark and enable verbose Glide logging #24033
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • 894511 : Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24161
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix for Entry SelectionLength #24064
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix ToolbarItem font color issue after changing available state. #24065
    community ✨, .NET 8 SR9
  • [Testing] Ported randomly failing tests to Appium #24036
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-flakiness
  • Port all remaining Xamarin.UITest tests to Appium #24153
    area-testing
  • UI testing doc changes #24165
    area-docs
  • 2174059 MAUI hit testing ignores pages loaded by PushModalAsync #24109
  • Remove non-functioning code and instead throw a more helpful platform-not-supported error #23617
    community ✨
  • [Android] DatePicker Focus and Unfocus events #20547
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • NavigationBar properties not updating - fix #23076
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • Fix Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24156
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix for the CarouselView doesn't scroll to the right Position after changing the ItemSource with Loop enabled #24160
    community ✨
  • Remove MAUI styling from Blazor Hybrid Solution template #24136
    area-templates
